name: Greener Goddess Dressing
description: This thick, creamy tarragon and basil dip and dressing is giving a green buttery oomph with blended avocado.  Great for salads, but even better for crudités and shrimp cocktail.
recipeIngredient: Freshly cracked black pepper, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Put everything in the blender, and whiz on full blast until completely smooth. Serve over an iceberg wedge, with crudités, with shrimp cocktail, or with anything you want.
